about_the_game:
Story:

As a cross-dimensional traveler, —the bravest of your kind— you arrive at a vast, dystopian wilderness that mysteriously defies the very essence of purity in nature. These territories are populated by legions of hostile miscreants whose leaders direct them in their constant persecution of a distant civilization that is peaceful. Although you'll never meet those whom you've been sent to liberate from this tyranny, the consequences of their secured freedom will forever justify your line, and the righteous home that you come from. This is a saga which highlights a notion of "pre-redemption" through unwavering sacrifice in the face of the unknown.


Game Features:

  • Open-World Navigation/Exploration

  • NPC Guidance/Subtitle Communication

  • Day/Night Cycles

  • Items Collection

  • Numerous Attack Abilities

  • Fast-Paced Combat (General)

  • Boss Fights/Spoils

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4-core Intel/AMD 3.2 Ghz, 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 6-core Intel/AMD 4.0 Ghz, 64 bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Navigate a vast wilderness, battling countless enemies with the goal of liberating a desperate civilization from tyranny.
